body_html:
Thanks for sending over that code. There's nothing obvious in that file that would lead to variables being uninitialized, but I haven't read all of the files.

Could you try adding an explicit call to sess.run(init_op) in your session, to see if the initialization is being missed for some reason?

If that doesn't fix things, the next step would be to package up your code as a single file with no external code or data dependencies, and we can take a look at why the initialization isn't working as expected.

body:
Thanks for sending over that code. There's nothing obvious in that file that would lead to variables being uninitialized, but I haven't read all of the files.

Could you try adding an explicit call to `sess.run(init_op)` in your session, to see if the initialization is being missed for some reason?

If that doesn't fix things, the next step would be to package up your code as a single file with no external code or data dependencies, and we can take a look at why the initialization isn't working as expected.
